details.gql: query SearchListings($location: String, $maxPrice: Float, $minGuests: Int) { searchListings(location: $location, maxPrice: $maxPrice, minGuests: $minGuests) { propertyId title location pricePerNight maxGuests } }

CreateListingSection.description: A section for hosts to create a new listing.

data_requirements.description: Create a new listing with the provided details.

details.gql: mutation CreateListing($title: String!, $description: String!, $location: String!, $address: String!, $pricePerNight: Float!, $maxGuests: Int!, $amenities: [String!]!) { createListing(title: $title, description: $description, location: $location, address: $address, pricePerNight: $pricePerNight, maxGuests: $maxGuests, amenities: $amenities) { propertyId } }
